website_summaries.verdict: Basic-style clear, glass mugs that come in a set of 4.
pros: Can be put in the dishwasher
Holds a decent amount of liquid
Clear to allow you to see tea steeping
cons: Very hot liquid is able to crack or break these glass mugs
Seam on the handle is not smooth

customer_reviews.title: Caution- they shatter
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these. They shatter upon pouring hot liquid into them. I had one break while I was holding it and pouring hot water for tea. It was very dangerous. I thought it was just a defective one. Another one just shattered while my wife was pouring some tea. Caution. Very, very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Ali A.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Had these for about 3 weeks. Filled one up with some hot water for tea and the glass split right in two along the seam (see pic). Bottom fell out along with scalding hot liquid, very lucky I didn't seriously cut my foot. The next day I open my dishwasher and I have .75 cups as the handle broke off one of them in the dishwasher. My previous ceramic cups I had for 10 years and never had a problem - I just wanted something that "looked a little nicer." Big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchster

customer_reviews.title: Love These Mugs!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these handsome mugs 2 1/2 years ago, one set for my husband and me, and one for my daughter. We've all been happy with them. No toxic ceramic leaching lead and who-know's-what into your beverage. We've had 2 mugs break, one fell off a table onto a hardwood floor, the other my husband poured boiling HOT tea into it (it broke cleanly in half, into 2 pieces). These mugs have handled very hot liquids, hotter than we can drink; just let the water cool ever so slightly so that it's not literally boiling. These sturdy thick mugs will not tip over like those with narrower bottoms. I'm here to purchase another set for us. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs, decent size!
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs! I got them on a flash sale so I thought they would look cheap but they’re beautiful. I’ve wanted a set like this for a while and these were perfect. The only thing I don’t like so much is how shallow the handle is, I wish there was more room for my fingers in between the handle and the glass.

customer_reviews.title: Defect in Manufacture
